## IShape.IsDecorative 属性

获取或设置“标记为装饰性”选项，读/写布尔值。

```csharp
public bool IsDecorative { get; set; }
```

### 示例

```csharp
using (Presentation pres = new Presentation("sample.pptx"))
{
    pres.Slides[0].Shapes[0].IsDecorative = true;
}
```
